version.description: 1. Only update files who have changed. 2. Will not try to create emum tables every time.

version.summary: Fixed a bug about loading value to item property.
version.description: 1. Item proerty will load correct column value. 2. Changing HttpContext.Current.Cache to HttpRuntime.Cache to support cache in windows application.

version.summary: Fixed a bug about loading value to item property.
version.description: 1. Item proerty will load correct column value.

version.summary: Update a logic about item property.
version.description: 1. A property will not be mapped to an unknown item type.
1. Change sub-item type property of item to public. 2. Now, can pass through a connectioin string into a data access method. 3. Add a partial keyword to the data access results class.

version.summary: Update code template and cache policy.
version.description: 1. Fixed a bug when getting item by primary key from a collection. 2. Fixed a bug about cache expiration.
1. Fixed a bug about JsonBuilder class can not convert a enum in some case.

version.summary: Update template and change Updater UI.
version.description: 1. Add update summary to DbSharper Updater. 2. Remove cache when the dataaccess method does not start with "Get". 3. Add Serializable attribute to result class. 4. Fixed a bug about dbsx rules. 5. Fixed a bug about throw exception where procedure does not match mask.

version.summary: Fix bug, update API and change UI.
version.description: 1. Processing form size changed. 2. ItemBase class remove the old property named "Fields". 3. Fixed a bug about ItemBase class Clone method. 4. Add a database name prefix to cache key(code and cache config template). 5. Use addtional parameters in Update, Create method when the parameter is not a item property. 6. Fixed a bug about inserting a null to cache.

version.summary: Fix bug, update API and change UI.
version.description: 1. Processing form size changed. 2. ItemBase class adds a new property named "ExtendedFields" to replace the old "Fields" property. 3. Fixed a bug about ItemBase class throwing exception in JavaScriptSerializer class. 4. Seperate namespace by first letter in code template.
1. Processing form size changed. 2. Fix a bug about code generator template.
